channel.title: My first gaming sig(not done in photoshop)
channel.description: Hey, i have been doing graphics editing for bout 2 months a program called PDN but i havent tried making a gaming sig. Can you please rate it keeping in mind that i havent been doing it for long... Sig: [img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/231/assasianscreedtb3.jpg[/img] Thanks, PS.Should i torrent PhotoShop?

item.title: My first gaming sig(not done in photoshop)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Not X A Alex, post:8, topic:176707”][quote author=sonny bill 9 link=topic=237465.msg2020382#msg2020382 date=1201579094]

Lol paint.net … i wouldn’t say it was one of the better programs for this type of digital art.

Well i have spent like 2 days trying to find a non virus crack for photoshop…
[/quote]
Wow seriously? I found mine in like ~20 mins.[/quote]

I found mine in 10 minutes, CS3 crack.

anyways I like the signature, looks real good.

Read full topic

item.title: My first gaming sig(not done in photoshop)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Holy crap your’e dumb.

You first download the adobe photoshop cs2 trial (you’d have to torrent it now, as I believe adobe only hosts cs3 on their site). Install it.

Then you download the zipped crack and do the rest.

Read full topic
item.source: My first gaming sig(not done in photoshop)

item.title: My first gaming sig(not done in photoshop)
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:20, topic:176707”][quote author=sonny bill 9 link=topic=237465.msg2021898#msg2021898 date=1201667771]
so once extracted do i just put in program files and run?
[/quote]

No.
It should be the ‘photoshop.exe’ if I’m not mistaken.

What you would do with this crack is copy and paste it in your adobe/photoshop folder where the old one is, and hit ‘yes’ when asked to overwrite.

Then just make a shortcut out of that, and the 30 day trial shouldn’t bother you anymore.[/quote]
so where do i get the adobe/photoshop folder, let me get this straight
1.download zipped folder
2.extract
3.copy
Then i get stuck lol

Read full topic
item.source: My first gaming sig(not done in photoshop)

item.title: My first gaming sig(not done in photoshop)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

No.
It should be the ‘photoshop.exe’ if I’m not mistaken.

What you would do with this crack is copy and paste it in your adobe/photoshop folder where the old one is, and hit ‘yes’ when asked to overwrite.

Then just make a shortcut out of that, and the 30 day trial shouldn’t bother you anymore.

Read full topic
